metadata.name: API Consumers Competency Package
metadata.shortDescription: API Consumers: review producer contracts, scaffold a consumer UI, and analyze change impact.
metadata.description: Competency package focused on consuming producer APIs from a consumer perspective: reviewing specifications and OpenAPI contracts, scaffolding consumer-facing UI journeys, and analyzing change/deprecation impact on consumer code.
objectives: Review producer specs and OpenAPI from a consumer perspective
Scaffold consumer UI journeys from spec and OpenAPI
Analyze consumer impact from changed, evolved, or deprecated endpoints
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

entry_points.name: Review Producer API As Consumer
entry_points.description: Review functional spec + OpenAPI from a consumer perspective to identify questions for producers and early development issues.

entry_points.name: Scaffold Angular Frontend From Spec
entry_points.description: Generate an Angular (Angular Material) consumer UI scaffold implementing spec-defined journeys beyond CRUD.

entry_points.name: Analyze API Change Impact From Deprecation Spec
entry_points.description: From change/deprecation documentation and optional OpenAPI diffs, analyze consumer code impact and produce a modification + retest tasklist.
